author: Xbox
description:
2053. As the Earth's surface resources dwindle, powerful corporations turn to the uncharted depths of the oceans, unaware of the ancient horror they are about to awaken. You play Noah, and with the help of Key, your AI companion, you’re tasked to investigate the mysterious disappearance of miners in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. But beware: the deeper you descend, the more your mind succumbs to Cthulhu's relentless influence. Will you resist it ?

Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss will be coming to Xbox Series X|S.
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nzjxf8mpzdw

author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're at WWE 2K25 Creator Fest in Orlando, Florida! Malik dives deep with the devs and talks with Jey Uso, Xavier Woods, and Shayna Baszler about what they're looking forward to. We're also stepping into the squared circle and getting hands on with the game.

00:00 Introduction
01:05 Creator Fest Tour
03:24 Interview with Jey Uso
05:49 Interview with Shayna Baszler
08:54 Interview with Xavier Woods
10:54 Gameplay
13:18 Dev Interview
15:03 The Island
17:21 Bloodline
23:52 Updates
27:36 GM Mode
29:09 Dev Wrap Up
32:52 Outro

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast

author: Xbox
description:
Jonathan Jacques-Belletête takes you on a journey through Hadea, revealing how Hell is Us guides players through its world without traditional waypoints or markers. Learn how the game delivers clues in unique ways, staying true to its core philosophy: Player Plattering.

Hell is Us will be release on Sept 4, 2025 on Xbox Series X|S.
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/hell-is-us/9n9097g0xzmb

author: Xbox
description:
Crime doesn’t pay, but it doesn’t stop the bad guys from trying in this stand-alone follow-up to RoboCop: Rogue City. 

OCP’s latest project, OmniTower, a massive complex built for the residents of Old Detroit has been seized by a group of highly trained mercenaries who shoot first and ask questions… well never. 

RoboCop: Rogue City – Unfinished Business is coming to Xbox Series X|S in Summer 2025. 

https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nnnfb5f54c9

description:

description:
Get your first tease of the gameplay from The Sinking City 2. Explore the flooded city of Arkham in this Lovecraftian survival horror coming to Xbox.

Experience a heart-pounding survival horror as you explore the flooded city of Arkham and fight eldritch monsters beyond human comprehension.

author: Xbox
description:
Pre-Order South of Midnight Now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/south-of-midnight
 
In South of Midnight players will come face-to-face with mythical creatures inspired by American Southern folklore. 

In this music clip, Altamaha-ha's legend is brought to life in an original song that helps shape its story. 

Coming to Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series XIS, Steam, and Windows PC on April 8th, 2025.
